00039 namespace Hypertable {
00040 
00045   class ApplicationQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00046 
00047     class UsageRec {
00048     public:
00049       UsageRec() : thread_group(0), running(false), outstanding(1) { return; }
00050       uint64_t thread_group;
00051       bool     running;
00052       int      outstanding;
00053     };
00054 
00055     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, UsageRec *> UsageRecMap;
00056 
00057     class WorkRec {
00058     public:
00059       WorkRec(ApplicationHandler *ah) : handler(ah), usage(0) { return; }
00060       ~WorkRec() { delete handler; }
00061       ApplicationHandler   *handler;
00062       UsageRec             *usage;
00063     };
00064 
00065     class ApplicationQueueState {
00066     public:
00067       ApplicationQueueState() : queue(), usage_map(), queue_mutex(), usage_mutex(), cond(), shutdown(false) { return; }
00068       std::list<WorkRec *> queue;
00069       UsageRecMap         usage_map;
00070       boost::mutex        queue_mutex;
00071       boost::mutex        usage_mutex;
00072       boost::condition    cond;
00073       bool                shutdown;
00074     };
00075 
00076     class Worker {
00077 
00078     public:
00079 
00080       Worker(ApplicationQueueState &qstate) : m_state(qstate) {
00081         return;
00082       }
00083 
00084       void operator()() {
00085         WorkRec *rec = 0;
00086         std::list<WorkRec *>::iterator iter;
00087 
00088         while (true) {
00089 
00090           {  // !!! maybe ditch this block specifier
00091             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.queue_mutex);
00092 
00093             while (m_state.queue.empty()) {
00094               if (m_state.shutdown)
00095                 return;
00096               m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00097             }
00098 
00099             {
00100               boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00101 
00102               for (iter = m_state.queue.begin(); iter != m_state.queue.end(); iter++) {
00103                 rec = (*iter);
00104                 if (rec->usage == 0 || !rec->usage->running) {
00105                   if (rec->usage)
00106                     rec->usage->running = true;
00107                   m_state.queue.erase(iter);
00108                   break;
00109                 }
00110                 rec = 0;
00111               }
00112             }
00113             if (rec == 0) {
00114               if (m_state.shutdown)
00115                 return;
00116               m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00117               if (m_state.shutdown)
00118                 return;
00119             }
00120           }
00121 
00122           if (rec) {
00123             rec->handler->run();
00124             if (rec->usage) {
00125               boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00126               rec->usage->running = false;
00127               rec->usage->outstanding--;
00128               if (rec->usage->outstanding == 0) {
00129                 m_state.usage_map.erase(rec->usage->thread_group);
00130                 delete rec->usage;
00131               }
00132             }
00133             delete rec;
00134           }
00135         }
00136 
00137         HT_INFO("thread exit");
00138       }
00139 
00140     private:
00141       ApplicationQueueState &m_state;
00142     };
00143 
00144     boost::mutex           m_mutex;
00145     ApplicationQueueState  m_state;
00146     boost::thread_group    m_threads;
00147     bool joined;
00148 
00149   public:
00150 
00157     ApplicationQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00158       Worker Worker(m_state);
00159       assert (worker_count > 0);
00160       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00161         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00162       //threads
00163     }
00164 
00165     ~ApplicationQueue() {
00166       if (!joined) {
00167         shutdown();
00168         join();
00169       }
00170     }
00171 
00177     void shutdown() {
00178       m_state.shutdown = true;
00179       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00180     }
00181 
00186     void join() {
00187       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00188       if (!joined) {
00189         m_threads.join_all();
00190         joined = true;
00191       }
00192     }
00193 
00200     void add(ApplicationHandler *app_handler) {
00201       UsageRecMap::iterator uiter;
00202       uint64_t thread_group = app_handler->get_thread_group();
00203       WorkRec *rec = new WorkRec(app_handler);
00204       rec->usage = 0;
00205 
00206       if (thread_group != 0) {
00207         boost::mutex::scoped_lock ulock(m_state.usage_mutex);
00208         if ((uiter = m_state.usage_map.find(thread_group)) != m_state.usage_map.end()) {
00209           rec->usage = (*uiter).second;
00210           rec->usage->outstanding++;
00211         }
00212         else {
00213           rec->usage = new UsageRec();
00214           rec->usage->thread_group = thread_group;
00215           m_state.usage_map[thread_group] = rec->usage;
00216         }
00217       }
00218 
00219       {
00220         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.queue_mutex);
00221         m_state.queue.push_back(rec);
00222         m_state.cond.notify_one();
00223       }
00224     }
00225   };
00226   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<ApplicationQueue> ApplicationQueuePtr;

00228 }
